sentence.Network_en: Nancy wasn't sure what to make of Mick's apology.
sentence.Network_cn: 南希不知应该如何理解米克的道歉。

sentence.Network_en: Westcott appealed to Waite for an apology, which he duly received.
sentence.Network_cn: 韦斯科特要求韦特道歉，且如愿以偿。

sentence.Network_en: Jones' lawyers are seeking an unreserved apology from the newspaper.
sentence.Network_cn: 琼斯的律师要求报纸坦诚道歉。

list.abs: 道歉的英文单词是什么？_百度知道 ... I must apologize. 我必须道歉。 I apologize. 我很抱歉。 apologize 道歉.
(76 )美国的公民守则17 17.真诚道歉 (apologize earnestly) 翟评:中国人爱面子,稍有地位的人总是很难道歉,有时道歉了,背后还想着因.

jx.jx_en_mean: used before the name of an author or artist to indicate that something is a parody or adaptation of their work
jx.jx_cn_mean: [用于作者或艺术家姓名之前，表示本人作品中有模仿或改编自其作品之处]模仿之处，敬请谅鉴

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (denoting a formal defence against an accusation): from French apologie, or via late Latin from Greek apologia 'a speech in one's own defence', from apo 'away' + -logia (see -logy)

entry.def: An apology is something that you say or write in order to tell someone that you are sorry that you have hurt them or caused trouble for them.

example.ex: We received a letter of apology...
example.tran: 我们收到了一封致歉信。

entry.def: If you offer or make your apologies, you apologize.

example.ex: His mother offered her apologies to the Jones family...
example.tran: 他的母亲向琼斯一家赔了不是。

example.ex: When Mary finally appeared, she made her apologies to Mrs Madrigal.
example.tran: 最终露面时，玛丽向马德里加尔夫人表示了歉意。

entry.def: If you say that you make no apologies for what you have done, you are emphasizing that you feel that you have done nothing wrong.

example.ex: Union officials made no apologies for the threatened chaos.
example.tran: 工会干部们对于迫在眉睫的混乱局面不予道歉。

means.word_mean: 1. an expression of regret at having caused trouble for someone;

sentences.sentence: "he wrote a letter of apology to the hostess"

means.word_mean: 2. a formal written defense of something you believe in strongly

sentences.sentence: "it was an apology for a meal"

auth_sentence.content: It's now issued an apology on its website.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's now issued an apology on its website.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's now issued an apology on its website.

auth_sentence.content: You may feel like someone owes you an apology.
auth_sentence.res_content: You may feel like someone owes you an apology.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You may feel like someone owes you an apology.

auth_sentence.content: He has of course issued his statement of apology.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has of course issued his statement of apology.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has of course issued his statement of apology.

means.word_mean: 道歉, 认错, 愧悔

sentences.en: I'm afraid I was rather bad-tempered yesterday; I think I owe you an apology.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我昨天的脾气不怎么好, 我认为应该向你道歉。

jushi.english: He phoned after talking to Marsha and was full of apologies.
jushi.chinese: 他跟玛莎谈过之后，打电话来连声道歉。
